results.overview: Christmas 1999, in a peaceful little village in the Ardennes. The life of a young boy named Antoine will soon be devastated by three tragic events : the death of a dog, the vanishing of a child, and a big ravaging storm.
results.title: Three Days and a Life

results.overview: Commander Logar fools Arif and sends him 1.000.000 years back in the time. He must civilize people from past to reach today.
results.title: A.R.O.G

results.overview: A group of rodeo trick-riders recruits a young girl to join them.
results.title: Cowgirls n' Angels

results.original_title: Dajjal the Slayer and His Followers
results.overview: The story of good and evil faith and Proxy wars for a world's dominating Kingdom where the world ruler will be the patriarch of an international worship places. Film is based on current world order scenarios but is fiction, where we have heroes who are trying to save humanity.
results.title: Dajjal the Slayer and His Followers

results.overview: Ostwind and Mika have found a real home at the farm Kaltenbach with Mika's grandmother. In the hustle of running therapy center and due to Mika's fame as a horse-whisperer, she feels that she doesn't have enough freedom and time to ride. After a serious disagreement with her grandmother, Mika secretly sets off for the night in eastern Andalusia, Spain, where she suspects Ostwind's roots are.
results.title: Windstorm 3

results.overview: After a team of surgeons botches his beloved wife's operation, the distraught Dr. Phibes unleashes a score of Old-Testament atrocities on his enemies.
results.title: The Abominable Dr. Phibes

results.overview: When Jack and Sally announce that they're splitting up, this comes as a shock to their best friends Gabe and Judy. Maybe mostly because they also are drifting apart and are now being made aware of it. So while Jack and Sally try to go on and meet new people, the marriage of Gabe and Judy gets more and more strained, and they begin to find themselves being attracted to other people.
results.title: Husbands and Wives

results.overview: The story centers on an elderly hibakusha, whose husband was one of 80,000 human beings killed in the 1945 atomic bombing of Nagasaki, caring for her four grandchildren over the summer. She learns of a long-lost brother, Suzujiro, living in Hawaii who wants her to visit him before he dies.
results.title: Rhapsody in August

results.overview: Sherina is now an adult and works as a journalist. While Sadam is no longer Mami's child but a traveler. The two then went on an adventure in the jungles of Borneo.
results.title: Sherina's Adventure 2

results.overview: Steve and Cynthia are a newlywed couple celebrating their first Christmas together. They invite their families to join them for the holidays, but when Steve is laid off just before Christmas and Cynthia discovers she's pregnant, they both keep their news secret in hopes that the celebration runs smoothly.
results.title: A Perfect Christmas

results.overview: After the First World War, the Allies occupy Istanbul. The protagonist, Yandim Ali is a rogue, discharged from the navy, who doesn't believe that the country can be saved, until he meets Mustafa Kemal (Ataturk), who plans to start a resistance in Anatolia against the occupying Allies, as well as the collaborators of an Ottoman government, that exists only on paper.
results.title: The Last Ottoman: Knockout Ali

results.overview: Before he hit it big, Takeshi Kitano got his start apprenticing with comedy legend Fukami of Asakusa. But as his star rises, his mentor's declines.
results.title: Asakusa Kid

results.overview: In Acapulco, Hercule Poirot attends a dinner party in which one of the guests clutches his throat and suddenly dies. The causes seem to be natural until another party with most of the same guests produces another corpse.
results.title: Murder in Three Acts

results.original_title: An Untitled Film by George Alshevskij-Jones
results.overview: “An Untitled Film” by George Alshevskij-Jones is a short documentary/visual essay about the struggles of moving to seek a better future in a different country. The research for the film was done by observing and talking to people who have left their home country.  It doesn’t matter what country a person has left and in which country he has found himself, the general experiences and emotions stay the same.  The most important message that I want the film to convey is that everything is possible and home is not a place on a map, but a place in the soul of each person that I spoke to. The unconventional way of showing many people as one is not just a way of making the film more convenient to create, but a way to fit a much information into one consistent image, that the audience is more likely to understand and perceive as the author intended it.  My own experience blended in with the experiences of others.
results.title: An Untitled Film by George Alshevskij-Jones

results.original_title: Emmanuelle in Space 5: A Time to Dream
results.overview: Emmanuelle teaches her alien friends to explore sexual fantasy through their dreams, and searches for her own dream lover.
results.title: Emmanuelle in Space 5: A Time to Dream

results.overview: Hilarious and outgoing, Brittany Forgler, is everybody’s best friend ― except her own. Her partying, underemployment and toxic relationships are catching up with her. She receives a startling wake-up call when a visit to the doctor reveals how unhealthy she is. Motivated to lose weight, but too broke for a gym and too proud to ask for help, Brit is at a loss, until her neighbor pushes her to run one sweaty block. Soon, she sets an almost unthinkable goal: the New York City Marathon.
results.title: Brittany Runs a Marathon

results.overview: While Yeung Kam Wing is trying to remove all connections between the mob and him, his actions are being carefully observed by Lau Kin Ming, who bears a personal grudge against him.
results.title: Infernal Affairs III

results.overview: After the Tennysons are attacked by a villainous, dimension-hopping Omni-alien known only as Alien X, they meet a parallel universe version of Max, who opens the door to hosting multiple Bens and Gwens, forming an army to combat this threat. Based on the 2016 reboot.
results.title: Ben 10: Alien X-Tinction

results.overview: The story revolves around two spoiled youngsters, Jones and his cousin Korah and the turn of events during their vacation.
results.title: ABCD: American-Born Confused Desi

results.overview: In this anthology of shorts, the phrase "Gay Agenda" is reclaimed from the religious right and transformed into a celebration of gay culture. Sit back and enjoy "The Future", "Hotel Paraíso", "Toto Forever", "Damaged Goods" and "Blow Job 2017".
results.title: The Gay Agenda 22
